item.description: Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1706; 11:29PM; 2814 S Abbot Kinney Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KrUxgL; #Venice; 34 firefighters took 20 minutes (11:49 PM) to access, confine and fully extinguish fire in one unit of a one-story strip mall. No injury. Fire cause under active investigation; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; AR1 BC4 E263 E292 E62 E63 E67 RA63 T63 T92; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Update Agency Assist; INC#1331; 10:14PM; 746 E Commercial St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GMlA4f; #Downtown; LAFD worked for nearly four hours alongside law enforcement, rail and utility officials in a coordinated effort to stabilize the *still ongoing situation* involving one adult male who refuses to come down from a tall electrical transmission tower in an industrial area. Though LAPD Officers will continue to interact with the man, they have released all LAFD resources. Media Inquiries: LAPD Central Division (Incident #3592), LA DWP, Metrolink and Amtrak.; FS 4; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E202 E203 E27 E290 E4 EM1 H3 HA3 RA2 RA803 T2 T3 T90 UR3; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1411; 07:51PM; 857 S Manhattan Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nzwK4M; #Koreatown; 51 firefighters took just 26 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire on the 2nd floor of a vacant and boarded two-story home. No injury. Fire cause under investigation; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 4; BC11 BC18 CM22 E13 E211 E215 E226 E229 E233 E26 E29 EM11 RA26 RA829 T11 T15 T26 T29 T33; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1411; 07:25PM; 857 S Manhattan Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nzwK4M; #Koreatown; PRELIM: 2 story vacant and boarded home with fire on the 2nd floor; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 4; BC11 E13 E211 E29 LF26 LF29 RA26 RA929 T11; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Agency Assist; INC#1331; 06:31PM; 800 E Jackson St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GJ3eRM; #Downtown; LAFD responding by ground and air to assist law enforcement at a single patient behavioral emergency, where one adult male has climbed a tall electrical transmission tower in an industrial area. No escalating or off-site hazard known. To assure patient and responder safety, all train traffic on the west side of the L.A. River will be stopped until emergency operations are complete. LA DWP is en route. Train Riders: Follow @Metrolink and @PacSurfliners on Twitter ( https://twitter.com/metrolink and https://twitter.com/PacSurfliners ) for any service related information. Media Inquiries: LAPD Central Division (Incident #3592); FS 4; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E202 E203 E4 EM1 RA2 T2 T3 UR3; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Pedestrian Struck; INC#1412; 06:22PM; 7400 N Winnetka Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3I8yr0S; #Winnetka; One person (unknown age / gender) deceased at scene after reportedly being struck by a vehicle. No other injuries. Circumstances unknown. #LATraffic: Closure of one or more lanes of traffic in the immediate area until LAPD on-site operations are complete, unknown duration. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Detours are readily available. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #3300); FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; E73 RA72 RA93; CH8; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision; INC#0757; 11:53AM; 8618 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/325KHzQ; #BroadwayManchester; At least 6 patients. No reports of entrapment. No details on age / gender / condition / affiliation / circumstances. Media Inquiries: LAPD South Traffic Division (Incident #1788); FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E264 E33 E57 E64 E66 EM1 EM11 EM13 RA21 RA264 RA64 RA65 RA833 RA864 T64; CH4; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1423; 08:03PM; 6234 N Agnes Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/33LSzas; #NorthHollywood; 21 Firefighters took just 15 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish an intense outside fire that extended into a debris-filled detached garage conversion at the east end of the property. Firefighters prevented all but exterior damage to the eaves of the 1,066 square-foot one-story primary residence, and halted flames before they could cause any damage to a neighboring home to the north. During the firefight, firefighters encountered an adult male resident with 2nd degree burns to his hands and legs. He was provided immediate on-scene care before being transported by LAFD Paramedics to an area hospital in serious condition. No other injuries reported. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E260 E89 RA889 RA89 T60; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1423; 07:48PM; 6234 N Agnes Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/33LSzas; #NorthHollywood; PRELIM: Outside fire in the rear yard has extended into a one story home.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E260 E89 RA889 RA89 T60; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Hiker Rescue; INC#0923; 02:18PM; Temescal Gateway Park; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KtgyMv; #PacificPalisades; LAFD ground and air response to an adult female hiker with a fractured ankle, south of Temescal Canyon Falls. LAFD ground crew is with patient, providing care and preparing her to be hoisted into a hovering LAFD rescue helicopter for continuing care during direct transport to an area hospital.; FS 69; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E19 E269 H1 H5 HA1 HA5 RA69 RH114 T69; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey
